Message:
“I cannot fight like all of you.
But, I can at least grow flowers.”

“If I cover this Duchy with flowers,
I’m sure I can bring smiles
to everyone’s faces.”

“If I filled the entire
world with flowers,

I’m positive everyone in
the whole world would smile.”

“Just as other nations
raise crops or make weapons,
I want to build a nation
that grows flowers.”

“But, I can just hear
everyone now, saying,
‘How do you expect us
to eat off of flowers?!’”

“Hehe! That sounds like
a very nice dream, indeed.”

The flowers before my eyes
were incredibly beautiful.
Looking at them,
I felt convinced that flowers
really could save the world.

“Please, allow me to help you
make that dream come true.”

He gave a look of surprise
at my response,
but then broke into a smile.

From that day forth,
my master’s dream
became my own.
